resources.string: 68000-based Macintosh variations including Classic Mac, Mac II, Mac LC, Quadra and Centris.

G3/G4/G5 PowerPC-based high performance Macintosh Models.
Mobile New world low-end PowerPC-based Macintosh Laptops
Mobile G3/G4 PowerPC-based Macintosh Laptops, mostly high-end.
